# 1 - Data Import and Descriptive Statistics

```{r}
# Load necessary libraries
library(tidyverse)
library(readr)
library(psych)
```

```{r}
# Import the dataset
df <- read_delim("~/SchoolWork/Y2S1/IO/PS1/IRI.csv")

glimpse(df)
describe(df$brand)
describe(df$parent)
```

# 2 - Descriptive Statistics by Brand
```{r}

```

# 3 - Descriptive Statistics by Parent
```{r}
describeBy(df, df$parent)
```
